ThingDef.Name: RFF_BrickWall
ThingDef.label: brick wall
ThingDef.description: A wall constructed of clay bricks and mortar.

ThingDef.label: rock mill
ThingDef.description: An electrically-powered mill for crushing and mixing rocks, sand and dirt. Much faster than manual operations at the stonecutter's table.

ThingDef.label: rough gravel to rough stone
ThingDef.description:
Places a layer of crushed stone that can be compacted into a rough stone surface. Takes a lot of work.

Place on: rough gravel.

Result: rough stone suited to the local bedrock.

ThingDef.label: rough gravel to rough gravel
ThingDef.description:
Sifts out any irregularities from rough gravel terrain. Useful for clearing mod-added terrains that are similar to rough gravel.

Place on: rough gravel equivalent.

Result: rough gravel.

ThingDef.label: sand to rough gravel
ThingDef.description:
Sifts out useable sand from sand terrain, leaving useless, infertile rough gravel.

Place on: sand (or soft sand).

Result: rough gravel.

Yields: sand x2.

ThingDef.label: stony soil to rough gravel
ThingDef.description:
Removes the usable material from stony soil, leaving useless, infertile rough gravel.

Place on: stony soil.

Result: rough gravel.

Yields: sand x2, clay x1, crushed rocks x1.

ThingDef.label: soil to rough gravel
ThingDef.description:
Removes dirt from fertile soil, leaving useless, infertile rough gravel.

Place on: any type of fertile soil.

Result: rough gravel.

Yields: dirt x3.

ThingDef.label: marshy soil to rough gravel
ThingDef.description:
Drains and clears usable material from marshy soil, leaving useless, infertile (but dry) rough gravel.

Place on: marshy soil.

Result: rough gravel.

Yields: dirt x2.

ThingDef.label: mud to rough gravel
ThingDef.description:
Clears and filters useful dirt from muddy terrain, leaving useless, infertile (but dry) rough gravel.

Place on: mud.

Result: rough gravel.

Yields: dirt x1.

ThingDef.label: stone to rough gravel
ThingDef.description:
Breaks up stone terrain into infertile rough gravel, allowing it to be further terraformed to a useful terrain.

Place on: any type of rough or smooth stone.

Result: rough gravel.

Yields: crushed rocks x2.

ThingDef.label: shallow water to rough gravel
ThingDef.description:
Fills in shallow water with rough gravel, allowing it to be further terraformed to a useful terrain.

Place on: any type of shallow water.

Result: rough gravel.

ThingDef.label: sand to sand
ThingDef.description:
Sifts out any irregularities from sand terrain. Useful to clear soft sand or modded-added terrains similar to sand.

Place on: sand equivalent.

Result: sand.

ThingDef.label: rough gravel to sand
ThingDef.description:
Places sand on rough gravel terrain.

Place on: rough gravel.

Result: sand.

ThingDef.label: stony soil to sand
ThingDef.description:
Sifts stony soil, removing larger stones and clumps of clay and leaving only fine sand.

Place on: stony soil.

Result: sand.

Yields: clay x1, crushed rocks x1.

ThingDef.label: soil to sand
ThingDef.description:
Breaks up and sifts fertile soil, leaving behind fine sand.

Place on: any type of fertile soil.

Result: sand.

Yields: dirt x1, clay x1, crushed rocks x1.

ThingDef.label: shallow water to sand
ThingDef.description:
Fills in shallow water with rock and covers it over with sand.

Place on: any type of shallow water.

Result: sand.

ThingDef.label: stony soil to stony soil
ThingDef.description:
Cleans out irregularities from stony soil. Useful for clearing mod-added terrains similar to stony soil.

Place on: stony soil equivalent.

Result: stony soil.

ThingDef.label: rough gravel to stony soil
ThingDef.description:
Reclaims rough gravel with rock, clay, and sand, creating rocky soil with low fertility.

Place on: rough gravel.

Result: stony soil.

ThingDef.label: sand to stony soil
ThingDef.description:
Mixes crushed rock and clay into sand, creating rocky soil with low fertility.

Place on: sand (or soft sand).

Result: stony soil.

ThingDef.label: soil to stony soil
ThingDef.description:
Sifts valuable dirt from fertile soil, reducing its fertilty somewhat.

Place on: any type of fertile soil.

Result: stony soil.

Yield: dirt x1.

ThingDef.label: soil to packed dirt
ThingDef.description:
Compacts dirt into a hard-packed surface, suitable for roads. Packed dirt does not slow people, but is not fertile. It can be returned to fertile soil relatively easily.

Place on: any type of fertile soil.

Result: packed dirt.

ThingDef.label: soil to soil
ThingDef.description:
Smooths out any irregularities in soil. Useful for cleaning out lichen or mod-added terrains similar to soil. Warning: will remove rich soil.

Place on: any type of fertile soil.

Result: soil.

ThingDef.label: sand to soil
ThingDef.description:
Mixes rocks, clay, and dirt into sand terrain to reclaim it for planting.

Place on: sand (or soft sand).

Result: soil.

ThingDef.label: stony soil to soil
ThingDef.description:
Reclaims stony soil with fresh dirt to enhance its fertility.

Place on: stony soil.

Result: soil.

ThingDef.label: rough gravel to soil
ThingDef.description:
Reclaims rough gravel with plenty fresh dirt to render it fertile.

Place on: rough gravel.

Result: soil.

ThingDef.label: packed dirt to soil
ThingDef.description:
Breaks up packed dirt, leaving fertile soil behind. Very fast.

Place on: packed dirt.

Result: soil.

ThingDef.label: mud to soil
ThingDef.description:
Reclaims muddy terrain with fresh dirt, rendering it fertile.

Place on: mud.

Result: soil.

ThingDef.label: marshy soil to soil
ThingDef.description:
Reclaims marshy soil with fresh dirt to make it more stable and faster to walk on.

Place on: marshy soil.

Result: soil.

ThingDef.label: marsh to soil
ThingDef.description:
Reclaims marshland with dirt, creating dry and fertile soil.

Place on: marsh.

Result: soil.

ThingDef.label: shallow water to soil
ThingDef.description:
Fills in shallow water with dirt, creating dry and fertile soil.

Place on: shallow water.

Result: soil.

ThingDef.label: mud to mud
ThingDef.description:
Cleans out irregularities from mud. Useful for clearing mod-added terrains similar to mud.

Place on: mud equivalent.

Result: mud.

ThingDef.label: soil to mud
ThingDef.description:
Waters down fertile soil, creating mud that doesn't support plants or buildings but can be used to slow down attackers.

Place on: any type of fertile soil.

Result: mud.

ThingDef.label: marshy soil to mud
ThingDef.description:
Dredges out marshy soil, yielding mud.

Place on: marshy soil.

Result: mud.

ThingDef.label: marsh to mud
ThingDef.description:
Adds bedrock below marshland, creating wet, muddy, but marginally solid ground.

Place on: marsh.

Result: mud.

ThingDef.label: marshy soil to marshy soil
ThingDef.description:
Clears out irregularities from marshy soil terrain. Useful to clean up mod-added terrain similar to marshy soil.

Place on: marshy soil equivalent.

Result: marshy soil.

Yields: dirt x1.

ThingDef.label: soil to marshy soil
ThingDef.description:
Harvests dirt from fertile soil, adding in stagnant surface water to make a spongy terrain with poor mobility.

Place on: any type of fertile soil.

Result: marshy soil.

Yields: dirt x1.

ThingDef.label: mud to marshy soil
ThingDef.description:
Adds dirt to mud to create soft, spongy, but fertile marshy ground.

Place on: mud.

Result: marshy soil.

ThingDef.label: marsh to marshy soil
ThingDef.description:
Adds dirt and bedrock to marshland, creating solid, but still wet, ground.

Place on: marsh.

Result: marshy soil.

ThingDef.label: soil to marsh
ThingDef.description:
Digs out a section of fertile soil and fills in the rest with silty water to create marshland.

Place on: any type of fertile soil.

Result: marsh.

Yields: dirt x1, clay x5.

ThingDef.label: mud to marsh
ThingDef.description:
Digs out a section of mud and fills in the rest with silty water to create marshland.

Place on: mud.

Result: marsh.

Yields: clay x5.

ThingDef.label: marshy soil to marsh
ThingDef.description:
Digs out marshy soil to create marsh adjacent to surface water (including other marshes).

Place on: marshy soil.

Result: marsh.

Yields: clay x5.

ThingDef.label: shallow water to marsh
ThingDef.description:
Adds dirt and silt to shallow water, converting it into marsh. 

Place on: shallow water.

Result: marsh.

ThingDef.label: sand to shallow water
ThingDef.description:
Digs out a section of sand to create a shallow trench. If adjacent to water, the trench will fill in with water of the appropriate type.

Place on: sand (or soft sand).

Result: shallow water (if near water).

Yields: sand x2, clay x5.

ThingDef.label: soil to shallow water
ThingDef.description:
Digs out a section of soil to create a shallow trench. If adjacent to water, the trench will fill in with water of the appropriate type.

Place on: any type of fertile soil.

Result: shallow water (if near water).

Yields: dirt x2, clay x5.

ThingDef.label: rough gravel to shallow water
ThingDef.description:
Digs out a section of rough gravel to create a shallow trench. If adjacent to water, the trench will fill in with water of the appropriate type.

Place on: rough gravel.

Result: shallow water (if near water).

Yields: clay x5.

ThingDef.label: marsh to shallow water
ThingDef.description:
Filters dirt and silt out of marshy water to create clean shallow water.

Place on: marsh.

Result: shallow water.

Yield: dirt x1.

ThingDef.label: deep water to shallow water
ThingDef.description:
Uses steel caisons and a large amount of rock to partially fill in deep water.

Place on: any type of deep water.

Result: shallow water.

ThingDef.label: shallow water to deep water
ThingDef.description:
Digs out an area of shallow water into deep water.

WARNING: Placing impassable deep water can trap your pawns or break raider visitor AI. Use at your own risk.

Place on: shallow water.

Result: deep water.

Yields: rock x5, clay x5.

ThingDef.label: marsh to deep water
ThingDef.description:
Digs out an area of marsh into deep water.

WARNING: Placing impassable deep water can trap your pawns or break raider AI. Use at your own risk.

Place on: marsh.

Result: deep water.

Yields: rock x5, clay x5.

ThingDef.label: ice to shallow water
ThingDef.description:
Break up ice to create shallow water. Only useable on Ice Sheet biomes.

Place on: ice terrain.

Result: shallow water.

ThingDef.label: ice to rough gravel
ThingDef.description:
Break up ice to reach solid ground. Not useable on Ice Sheet biomes.

Place on: ice terrain.

Result: rough gravel.

ThingDef.label: topsoil
ThingDef.description:
Place a layer of soil on smooth terrain to allow plants to be grown there.

Can be removed with the "Remove Floor" tool.

Place on: smooth stone or ice.

Result: topsoil.

ThingDef.label: fertilized topsoil
ThingDef.description:
Add fertilizer to topsoil to improve its fertility. Rich soil must be replenished with plant scraps or fertilizer to maintain its quality.

Can be removed with the "Remove Floor" tool.

Place on: topsoil.

Result: fertilized topsoil.

ThingDef.label: rich soil
ThingDef.description:
Add fertilizer to soil to improve its fertility. Rich soil must be replenished with plant scraps or fertilizer to maintain its quality.

Place on: any type of fertile soil.

Result: rich soil.

ThingDef.label: tilled soil
ThingDef.description:
Tills rich soil and adds additional fertilizer to maximize its fertility. Tilled soil must be replenished with plant scraps of fertilizer to maintain its quality.

Can be reverted to rich soil with the "Remove Floor" tool.

Place on: rich soil.

Result: tilled soil.

ThingDef.label: replenish soil
ThingDef.description: Replenishes worn-out soil with a little elbow grease.

ThingDef.label: compost bin
ThingDef.description: A bin in which raw compost, after three and a half days, will become fertilizer. The bin's kind of ugly, though, and smells a bit.

ThingDef.label: compost barrel
ThingDef.description: A compost barrel will convert 30 raw compost into 30 fertilizer. Unlike a compost bin, though, it requires power.

ThingDef.label: heavy sandbags
ThingDef.description: High-quality leather bags of locally-sourced dirt or sand held in place by steel rods. Sandbags are ugly, but provide excellent cover from ranged attacks.

ThingDef.label: plant scrap generator
ThingDef.description: Produces power by consuming plant scraps. Must be periodically loaded with plant scraps as fuel by hand.
